title: Lucky Bamboo Plant with Self Watering Plant
highlights: Bamboo attracts positive energy and good luck
If you are looking for good fortune and wealth, you should place your bamboo near the entrance of your home

Bamboo’s lifespan varies greatly depending on factors like species, treatment, and environmental conditions. Generally, untreated bamboo can last 2–6 years indoors, 0.5–4 years outdoors, and less than 0.5 years in ground contact.
Most bamboo, with a few exceptions, prefer to grow in full sun
